title: [K-12] Convergent Instructional Design Course for Strengthening Secondary Teachers' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory knowledge and general understanding of secondary curricula
context.additional_context: Structured around real-world, application-focused case studies in an environment enabling the use of smartphone-based digital content.

learning_goals: Participants can develop three or more lesson scenarios based on instructional design principles.
Participants can propose two or more student engagement strategies using social interaction techniques.
Participants can design outcome-based assessment tools and explain their alignment with educational activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
